00033    class CIStream : public Private::CNonCopyable
00034    {
00035    public:
00036 
00043       CIStream(const char* payload, size_t len);
00044       
00048       template<typename T>
00049       void read(T& value);
00050 
00054       void read(bool& b);
00055 
00059       void read(std::wstring& str);
00060 
00064       void read(std::string& buf);
00065      
00071       inline
00072       const void* gptr() const
00073       {
00074          return mData + mOffset;
00075       }
00076       
00082       inline 
00083       size_t glen() const
00084       {
00085          return mSize - mOffset;
00086       }
00087       
00091       inline
00092       void gbump(size_t len)
00093       {
00094          if (len <= glen())
00095          {
00096             mOffset += len;
00097          }
00098          else
00099          {
00100             mOffset = mSize;
00101             mError = ERANGE;
00102          }
00103       }
00104       
00110       inline
00111       int getError() const
00112       {
00113          return mError;
00114       }      
00115 
00116    private:
00117 
00121       void read( void *buffer, size_t size );
00122 
00123       const char* mData;
00124       size_t mSize;
00125       size_t mOffset;
00126 
00127       int mError;
00128    };

00131    // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00132    
00133    
00134    template<typename T>
00135    inline
00136    void CIStream::read(T& value)
00137    {   
00138       // if an error occured we just do nothing
00139       if( 0 == mError )
00140       {
00141          // aligning the read offset.
00142          mOffset += ((-mOffset) & (sizeof(T)/*=alignment*/ - 1));
00143          
00144          // checking if there is enough data in the stream
00145          if((mOffset+sizeof(T)) <= mSize )
00146          {
00147             value = *(T*)(mData+mOffset) ;
00148             mOffset += sizeof(T) ;
00149          }
00150          else
00151          {
00152             mError = ERANGE ;
00153          }
00154       }
00155    }
00156 
00157 
00158    inline
00159    void CIStream::read(void * buffer, size_t size)
00160    {
00161       if(0 == mError)
00162       {
00163          if(size <= (mSize-mOffset))
00164          {
00165             memcpy( buffer, mData + mOffset, size );
00166             mOffset += size ;
00167          }
00168          else
00169          {
00170             mError = ERANGE ;
00171          }
00172       }
00173    }
00174 
00175 
00176    inline
00177    void CIStream::read(bool& b)
00178    {
00179       int32_t bval = 0 ;
00180       read( bval ) ;
00181       b = (0 != bval) ;
00182    }

00190    str.read(s);
00191    return str;

00203 #define MAKE_DSI_DESERIALIZING_OPERATOR(type)               \
00204    inline                                                   \
00205    DSI::CIStream& operator>>(DSI::CIStream& str, type& t)   \
00206    {                                                        \
00207       str.read(t);                                          \
00208       return str;                                           \
00209    }

00226 
00227 template<typename T>      
00228 inline                                       
00229 DSI::CIStream& operator>>(DSI::CIStream& str, T& t) 
00230 {     
00231    DSI_STATIC_ASSERT(std::tr1::is_enum<T>::value);
00232    
00233    str.read((uint32_t&)t);         
00234    return str;   
00235 }

00238 #define DSI_VARIANT_DESERIALIZATIONVISITOR(baseclass)         \
00239    class DeserializationVisitor : public baseclass <>         \
00240    {                                                          \
00241    public:                                                    \
00242       explicit inline                                         \
00243       DeserializationVisitor(DSI::CIStream& is) : mIs(is) { } \
00244       template<typename T> inline                             \
00245       void operator()(T& t) { mIs >> t; }                     \
00246       inline void operator()() { assert(false); }             \
00247    private:                                                   \
00248       DSI::CIStream& mIs;                                     \
00249    }

00252 namespace DSI
00253 {
00254    namespace Private
00255    {
00256       DSI_VARIANT_DESERIALIZATIONVISITOR(TStaticVisitor);      
00257       
00258       template<typename T>
00259       struct VariantDeserializationHelperHelper
00260       {
00261          template<typename VariantT>
00262          static
00263          void eval(VariantT& v)
00264          {
00265             v.template reset<T>();
00266          }
00267       };
00268       
00269       template<>
00270       struct VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<Private::SNilType>
00271       {
00272          template<typename VariantT>
00273          static
00274          void eval(VariantT& v)
00275          {
00276             v.reset();
00277          }
00278       };
00279 
00280       struct VariantDeserializationHelper
00281       {
00282          template<typename VariantT>
00283          static inline
00284          void reset(VariantT& v, int idx)
00285          {
00286             typedef void(*CallfuncType)(VariantT&);
00287             static const CallfuncType funcs[] = {         
00288                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<Private::SNilType>::eval,
00289                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<0, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00290                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<1, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00291                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<2, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00292                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<3, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00293                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<4, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00294                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<5, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00295                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<6, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00296                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<7, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00297                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<7, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00298                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<8, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00299                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<10, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00300                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<11, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00301                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<12, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,
00302                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<13, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval,            
00303                &VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<typename Private::TypeListAlgos::RelaxedTypeAt<14, typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::type>::eval         
00304             };
00305                      
00306             if (idx > 0 && idx <= Private::TypeListAlgos::Size<typename VariantT::tTypelistType>::value)
00307             {            
00308                funcs[idx](v);
00309             }
00310             else
00311             {            
00312                VariantDeserializationHelperHelper<Private::SNilType>::template eval(v);            
00313             }
00314          }   
00315       };
00316 
00317    }   // namespace Private
00318    
00319 }   // namespace DSI

00321 
00322 template<typename TypelistT>
00323 inline
00324 DSI::CIStream& operator>>(DSI::CIStream& is, DSI::TVariant<TypelistT>& var)
00325 {
00326    int32_t typeId = 0;
00327    is >> typeId;     
00328 
00329    DSI::Private::VariantDeserializationHelper::reset(var, typeId);
00330    
00331    if (!var.isEmpty())   
00332    {            
00333       DSI::Private::DeserializationVisitor vst(is);
00334       DSI::staticVisit(vst, var);
00335    }
00336    
00337    return is;
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 template<typename T>
00342 inline
00343 DSI::CIStream& operator>>(DSI::CIStream& is, std::vector<T>& v)
00344 {
00345    int32_t newSize = 0;   
00346    is >> newSize;   
00347    v.resize(newSize);   
00348    
00349    for(typename std::vector<T>::iterator iter = v.begin(); iter != v.end(); ++iter)
00350    {   
00351       is >> *iter;
00352    }   
00353    
00354    return is;
00355 }
00356 
00357 
00358 // FIXME possibly need optimization - no temporaries
00359 template<typename KeyT, typename ValueT>
00360 inline
00361 DSI::CIStream& operator>>(DSI::CIStream& is, std::map<KeyT, ValueT>& m)
00362 {
00363    int32_t newSize = 0;   
00364    is >> newSize;   
00365    
00366    KeyT key;
00367    ValueT value;
00368       
00369    while(newSize-- > 0)
00370    {      
00371       is >> key;
00372       is >> value;
00373       
00374       m[key] = value;
00375    }   
00376    
00377    return is;
00378 }
